name: Mask Your Death
description:
A (very) short puzzle platformer created for Weekly Game Jam 131. The theme was "Magic Mask".

Play as a sentient pixel trying to escape the VRAM purge. Masking out your obstacles and foes to survive as you jump through three mediocre levels!

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Mask out red obstacles (Enemies)

Middle Mouse Button (Clicking the scroll wheel) - Mask out green obstacles (Platforms/walls)

Right Mouse Button - Mask out blue obstacles (Spikes)

Space - Jump/Double Jump (the faster you tap it in succession, the higher you'll go)

A & D - Left and Right respectively

ESC - Pause

Updates:

0.1 - Modified level 2 to make one of the jumps a little less luck based.
